com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCDesktopUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDesktopUI

  • public class YRCDesktopUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class which should be used when the application is of type YRCDesktopApplication.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPage

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getCurrentPage()

        Utility method which returns the current active page being displayed.

        • For example this method will return the innermost wizard instance in case the active editor has a wizard open.
        • This method will return the root screen/panel/form being displayed in a dialog, if a dialog is active.
        Returns:
        The current active pages composite.
        See Also:
        getTopCurrentPage()

      • getTopCurrentPage

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getTopCurrentPage()
        Returns the topmost panel in the active editor

        For example if the active page is a wizard opened in another wizard as a child wizard, even though child wizard is active, this method will return parent (topmost) wizard.

        Returns:
        topmost page in the active editor
        See Also:
        getCurrentPage()

      • getCurrentPart

        public static org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart getCurrentPart()
        Utility method which returns the current active editor being displayed.
        Returns:
        The current active editor.

      • isEditorBusy

        public final boolean isEditorBusy()
        Utility method to check if the active editor is busy because a API call is in progress.
        Returns:

      • hideSearchCriteria

        public final boolean hideSearchCriteria()
        Utility method to hide the search criteria. The page being displayed should implement the interface IYRCSearchAndListComposite.
        Returns:
        true if it was able to hide the search criteria and false otherwise.

      • resetSearchCriteria

        public final boolean resetSearchCriteria()
        Utility method to reset the search criteria. The page being displayed should implement the interface IYRCSearchAndListComposite.
        Returns:
        true if it was able to reset the search criteria and false otherwise.

      • search

        public final boolean search()
        Utility method to perform the search. The page being displayed should implement the interface IYRCSearchAndListComposite.
        Returns:
        true if it was able to search, false otherwise.

      • setPageScope

        public static final void setPageScope(java.lang.String scopeId)
        Utility method to set the page scope. This method will enable the specified scope/context/key-bindings on the current page which is active.

      • setPageScope

        public static final void setPageScope(IYRCComposite parentForm)
        Utility method to set the page scope. This method will enable the specified scope/context/key-bindings on the current page which is active.

        The scope id's to enable are derived from the parentForm passed as input.

        Typically this method makes use of the form id of the parentForm and the form id's of its children if it contains any.
        Parameters:
        parentForm - The parent screen based on which the scope needs to be set.

      • getScopeIdList

        public static java.util.ArrayList getScopeIdList(IYRCComposite parentForm)
        Returns a list of scope ids for the given form and its child forms having their behavior.
        Parameters:
        parentForm -
        Returns:
